item.title: EP 124 - No One Can Hear You Scream
item.itunes:title: No One Can Hear You Scream
item.description:
Today we take a quick look at tale of man, a homemade sword, and a quest for revenge. And then I will tell you two personal stories of times when ghosts manipulated my voice and why these events should terrify all paranormal investigators.

Patreon

Factory Worker Killed With Sword
http://www.nbcnews.com/id/6358778/ns/us_news-crime_and_courts/t/factory-worker-killed-sword/
